member.name: M:Tor_relay_scanner_CS.Program.Main(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.String,System.UInt32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String[],System.UInt32[],System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Automatically retrieves information about tor relays and scans them for reachability
member.param: The number of concurrent relays tested
Test until at least this number of working relays are found
Include only following countries for testing, exclude by adding '-'. Example: nl,de (only netherlands and germany) Example exclude: -nl (not netherlands)
Output reachable relays in torrc format (with "Bridge" prefix)
Set proxy for onionoo information download. Format: http://user:pass@host:port; socks5h://user:pass@host:port
Preferred alternative URL for onionoo relay list. Could be used multiple times.
Scan for relays running on specified port number. Could be used multiple times.
Not install bridges into Tor browser
Use already existing outdated relay info

members.member: Please be patient I have autism
Most of the fields are completely not necessary to load into memory
